01-01.character: Ambitious and visionary, you thrive when working toward a big dream with purpose.
01-01.love: You are drawn to partners who respect your independence but also share your deep values.
01-01.quote: The world doesn’t shape you — you shape the world.

01-02.character: Diplomatic and graceful, you are a natural harmonizer in both friendships and love.
01-02.love: You seek emotional connection, not drama. Deep talks over loud sparks.
01-02.quote: Harmony is not weakness, it’s strength with elegance.

01-03.character: Creative, expressive, and driven by results, you blend ideas with ambition.
01-03.love: You want someone who keeps up with your dreams — not someone who slows you down.
01-03.quote: Creation is action wrapped in passion.
